## Univariate Gaussian Mixture Models

### Implementation

```{r}

ugmm <- function(X, K, tol) {
  
  # Basics of X
  N <- length(X)
  
  # Initialise means
  mu <- rep(mean(X), K)
  
  # Initialise variances
  theta <- rep(var(X)^(1/K), K)
  
  # Initialise mixing proportions
  prop <- rep(1/K, K)
  
  # Initialise individual label probabilities and weighted densities
  g <- matrix(rep(prop, N), nrow=N, ncol=K)
  
  # Initialise the difference
  diff <- Inf
  old <- 0
  
  # Counter
  i <- 0
  
  # EM Algo
  while (TRUE) {
    
    # Update count
    i <- i + 1
    print(i)
    
    # E-step
    w <- matrix(numeric(N*K), nrow=N, ncol=K)
    for (k in 1:K) {
      w[,k] <- prop[k] * dnorm(X, mu[k], sqrt(theta[k]))
    }
    for (k in 1:K) {
      g[,k] <- w[,k]/rowSums(w)
    }
    
    # M-step
    for (k in 1:k) {
      # Calulcate Nk (reused across equations)
      Nk <- sum(g[,k])
      
      # Calculate mu_k
      mu[k] <- (1/Nk) * sum(g[,k] * x)
      
      # Calculate theta^2_k
      theta[k] <- (1/Nk)*sum(g[,k]*(x - mu[k])^2)
      
      # Update mixing proportions
      prop[k] <- Nk/N
    }
    
    # Calculate log-likelihood
    lli <- numeric(N)
    for (k in 1:K) {
      lli <- lli + g[,k] * (log(prop[k]) + log(dnorm(X, mu[k], sqrt(theta[k]))))
    }
    ll <- sum(lli)
    
    # Recalulate difference
    diff <- abs(ll - old)
    print(paste0("diff: ", diff))
    
    # Check
    if (diff < tol) break
    
    # Assume the loop hasn't ended, update the old ll
    old <- ll
    
  }
  
  return(list(mu=mu, theta=sqrt(theta), prop=prop))

}


```

Testing the function:

```{r}

# Simulate draws from 3 distributions
set.seed(1234)
x1 <- rnorm(1000, 0, 1)
x2 <- rnorm(1500, -4, 2)
x3 <- rnorm(500, 2, 0.5)

# Combine into single vector
x <- c(x1, x2, x3)

# Density Plot
plot(density(x))

# Estimate clusters
ugmm(x, 3, 0.0001)

```
